datasets.name: top_screen_views_dataset
queryLines:
WITH top_screens AS (
  SELECT
    screen,
    COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as unique_screen_views,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) DESC) as screen_rank
  FROM hpx_events_model
  WHERE
    event_date_time >= '2023-05-01'
    AND ui_action = 'screendisplayed'
    AND screen NOT IN ('home', 'welcome', 'welcomecontainer', 'welcome-core', 'support')
  GROUP BY screen
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) > 0
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN screen_rank <= 10 THEN screen
    ELSE 'Other'
  END as screen,
  DATE_TRUNC('DAY', event_date_time) as daily_event_date,
  COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as unique_screen_views
FROM hpx_events_model
JOIN top_screens USING (screen)
WHERE
  event_date_time >= '2023-05-01'
  AND ui_action = 'screendisplayed'
  AND screen NOT IN ('home', 'welcome', 'welcomecontainer', 'welcome-core', 'support')
GROUP BY
  CASE WHEN screen_rank <= 10 THEN screen ELSE 'Other' END,
  DATE_TRUNC('DAY', event_date_time)
ORDER BY
  daily_event_date,
  unique_screen_views DESC
